amendment.description: Amendment sought to redirect $1 million in funding from the MOX facility at the Savannah River site for use in producing an independent report to analyze potential cost-effective alternatives for plutonium disposition and a study on potential uses for the Savannah River site and other existing facilities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect $1,000,000 in funding within the Defense Nuclear Nonproliferation account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A038) Failed by voice vote.
